statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir // .cwd'); user=$(whoami); dir="${cwd/#$HOME/\~}"; if [ ${#dir} -gt 50 ]; then dir="…${dir: -47}"; fi; branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); status=""; if [ -n "$branch" ] && cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && [ -n "$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null)" ]; then status="●"; fi; time=$(date +%R); printf "\033[38;5;166m \033[0m\033[38;5;166m %s \033[0m\033[38;5;172m %s \033[0m" "$user" "$dir"; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf "\033[38;5;72m  %s %s\033[0m" "$branch" "$status"; fi; printf "\033[38;5;223m  %s \033[0m" "$time"
